title: Don't Buy Crackers When You Can Make Swedish Crispbreads
excerpt:
This recipe for Swedish knäckebröd comes from Emma Bengtsson, the two Michelin–starred chef of Aquavit.

Chances are, if you’re a Millennial, at least a few of your friends have gotten really into baking bread. But it’s a lot to take in, and a lot to learn, and if you fuck it up, there’s your IG …

title: This Vegan Egg Substitute Is So Good I Feel Guilty Eating It
excerpt:
I had to check the label twice to make sure what was on my plate didn’t come from a chicken.

The egg: versatile, protein-rich, great at any meal, for a snack, and don’t even get me started on its power as a leavener, binder, and emulsifier. You'd think I’d be a two-egg-a-day woman, but the truth is …
